plot outline: Sitanath Chatterjee is a retired govt. employee. Locally called by Suddhodadu. Lives happily with wife Sabitri. He never repents as he is childless. Gets out from his house in the morning carrying an umbrella and a bag, collects dirty plastic and papers from the road Thais how he spent his days. With one objective that Kolkata will be London cannot be one single persons dream, its his also. Some people also stop him locally. But on the other some youths like Bhai Da, Joy, Hablu, Bhola, Mithun comes forward to appraise him. There is no club in the locality who can dedicate themselves in this effort. Even he stretches his helping hand towards making a successful love life for Nita and Nabanita. But one day grandfather gets a heart block. Doctors declare him dead. Everyone in the locality takes up grandfather's unfinished job and take oath to complete it.
